scripts.ci: npm run audit && npm run typecheck && npm run test
scripts.prerelease:check: node -e "const { execSync } = require('child_process'); const branch = execSync('git branch --show-current', { encoding: 'utf8' }).trim(); if (branch !== 'main') { console.error('Error: Must be on main branch for releases. Current branch:', branch); process.exit(1); } const status = execSync('git status --porcelain', { encoding: 'utf8' }).trim(); if (status) { console.error('Error: Working tree is not clean. Please commit or stash changes:'); console.error(status); process.exit(1); } console.log('âœ… Repository is clean and on main branch');"
scripts.release:alpha: npm run prerelease:check && gh release create alpha-v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") --title "Alpha Release v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" --notes "Alpha build for internal testing" --prerelease
scripts.release:beta: npm run prerelease:check && gh release create beta-v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") --title "Beta Release v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" --notes "Beta build for external testing" --prerelease
scripts.release:production: npm run prerelease:check && gh release create v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") --title "Release v$(node -p "require('./package.json').version")" --notes "Production release"
